title: Elementor Page Builder
alt: Elementor is the best WordPress Page Builder, with over 5M active installs. Create beautiful websites using a simple, intuitive drag and drop interface. Live Front End editing.

title: One-Click Demo Import
alt: You can add the presented demos with just one click. The setup will be complete in 5-10 mins with our one-click solution.

title: Gutenberg Support
alt: The new Gutenberg has replaced the classic editor. It offers a new to create block-based functionality to create posts and pages in WordPress. You have Gutenberg's support for the theme.

title: WooCommerce Support
alt: The most customizable eCommerce platform for building your online business. Get started quickly and make your way.

title: Power Full Theme Options (Redux Framework)
alt: The most powerful, flexible, and complete WordPress interface and panel builder ever!

title: 35+ Resourceful Pages
alt: All the pages are created based on real content that you will need to run your business. Change image and text and you’re good to go!

title: Fully Responsive Layout
alt: All the pages of this Theme are responsive. We used the Bootstrap framework to build the website. It’s the best in class.

title: FullyCustomizable
alt: Our theme is fully customizable. You can change color combinations, fonts, icons, contents, images, etc. You can also add custom CSS.

title: Retina Ready Icons
alt: This theme comes with licensed premium quality icons from Linear icons. All the icons are font-based and ready to match the quality of any HQ.

title: Google Fonts
alt: A vast collection of Google fonts are integrating with the Theme. You can use any of them that goes with your branding.

title: Font Awesome 5 Pro Icons
alt: This theme comes with licensed premium quality icons from FontAwesome. All the icons are font-based and ready to match the quality of any HQ screen.

title: Lifetime Update
alt: Purchase our Theme only once and get lifetime updates. We keep updating our products to stay up to date with the latest trends and technology.

title: Mobile Optimized
alt: All the pages of this Theme are optimized. We used the Bootstrap framework to build the website. It’s the best in class.

title: RTL Language Support
alt: Arabic, Hebrew, Persian, and Urdu Sindhi are the most widespread RTL writing systems in modern times.

title: Faster Loading
alt: The website speed is very important for your SEO. Hence we’ve created Abstrak in a way that your website will load fast, and your ranking in search engines will be higher.
